      • getTempoAt

        private static double getTempoAt​(double date,
                                 meico.mpm.elements.maps.data.TempoData tempoData)
        compute the tempo in bpm from a given TempoData object and a date that should fall into the scope of the tempoData
        Parameters:
        date -
        tempoData - the application should make sure that date is in the scope of tempoData
        Returns:
        the tempo or 100.0 bpm if date lies out of scope or tempo data is insufficient
